Text:
I just downloaded "Pirates.Of.The.Carribean.The.Dead.Mans.Chest".  It turned out to be a FAKE. Yes it was f*cking FAKE.   The torrent was in RAR format and it was passworded.   So the passworded RAR file had no password, and it was a fake after all.

Don't download files that are ZIPed or RARed!!!

I wish PirateBay.com will ban motherf*kers who post fake files.

DONT DOWNLOAD RARed FILES!!!

craptastic, nothing personal, but you make a hell of a people neurvose.  Guys like you can easily get away with posting fake files.

Piratebay.com, PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE ban and discontinue the seeding of rar files.
